channel.title: Moonshine on Jay's Site

item.title: Farmers Tan
item.description: Cocktail A refreshingly acidic pick-me-up to ease you through the hottest days of Summer. 2 oz Lemongrass-infused Corn Moonshine* 1 oz Watermelon Shrub Â¾ oz lemon juice Add all ingredients to shaker, add ice, shake vigorously until properly chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a floating lime wheel. *Recommended: Belle Isle Moonshine Lemongrass-infused Corn Moonshine 750ml bottle Corn Moonshine 8 stalks of lemongrass Slice the lemongrass into small pieces, then combine with the Moonshine in a quart-sized Mason jar and let infuse for three days, agitating daily.
